# RecognizedItem.barcode(_:)

**Case**

A machine-readable barcode.

## Declaration

```swift
case barcode(RecognizedItem.Barcode)
```

## Machine-readable items

- **RecognizedItem.Barcode**: An object that represents a machine-readable code that the scanner recognizes.

items.description: An object that represents a machine-readable code that the scanner recognizes.
items.name: RecognizedItem.Barcode
